description: Single storey rear extension (Following demolition of part existing rear extension)
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.

| The development hereby approved shall be retained in accordance with drawing title number(s): VP01_GA_1009 A Existing Site Plan, VP01_GA_1010 A Existing Ground Floor Plan, VP01_GA_1020 A Existing Rear Elevation, VP01_GA_1021 A Existing

Side (West) Elevation, VP01_GA_1022 A Existing Front Elevation, VP01_GA_2009 B Proposed Site Plan, VP01_GA_2010 B Proposed Ground Floor Plan, VP01_GA_2011 B Proposed 1st Floor Plan / Roof Plan, VP01_GA_2021 B Proposed Rear Elevation, VP01_GA_2022 A Proposed Front Elevation, VP01_GA_2031 B Proposed Section AA, VP01_GA_2032 A Proposed Side (West) Elevation
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.

| The materials to be used for the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing, unless where stated on either the submitted application form or the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021), Policies 7.4, 7.6 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013), Policies 1.1 (k) and 1.2 (f) of the adopted Development (Core) Strategy (2012).
| The proposed rooflights hereby approved shall be in accordance with the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2)

Reason: To minimise light spillage and interference with the privacy and outlook of adjoining occupiers and in the interests of good neighbourliness and in accordance with policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013).
